legType.Wiki: Determines basic leg behavior. Value references are unknown.

weaponParamId.Wiki: Refers to EquipParamWeapon. Used to define scanner for with head parts, unknown usage with core parts.

quickBoostVelocity.Wiki: Referred to in-game as "Jump Distance". Does not affect jump distance.

quickBoostGroundedVerticalVelocity.Wiki: Vertical velocity gained from quick boosting while on the ground.

boostingJumpHorizontalSpeedBonus.Wiki: When boosting then jumping, takes current speed and multiplies it by this value then adds it to current speed.

jumpVelocityVertical.Wiki: Amount of vertical velocity when jumping.

jumpVelocityAcceleration.Wiki: How quickly jump reaches max velocity and velocity ends. Interrupted by boosting.

jumpVelocityHorizontalTransferred.Wiki: Amount of vertical jump velocity to transfer into horizontal velocity.

unkDisplayLegsJumpDistance.Wiki: Seemingly does nothing. UI element for "Jump Distance" is governed by quickBoostVelocity.

displayLegsJumpHeight.Wiki: >Only affects value displayed in UI. Use jumpVelocityAcceleration for actual effects.
